subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Trevor Daley knocked his own rebound into the goal 1 minute 51 seconds into overtime to give the Dallas Stars a 5-4 victory over Detroit, ending the Red Wings’ six-game winning streak. In a flurry of activity in front of Detroit goalie Chris Osgood, Daley took a shot that was knocked down. The puck was still on the ice when he followed up for his fourth goal of the season. Osgood had a season-high 45 saves.
